# Visual Trigger Ruleset (Fixture)

Default is on-camera unless one of these departures is triggered.

Diagram: use when the text explains systems, relationships, processes, or structures.

B-Roll A (Atmospheric): use for world-building around films, books, historical periods, or culture.

B-Roll B (Specific): use when a specific source clip or named reference is cited.

Emphasis: use for thesis declarations, conclusion lines, reframes, provocations, and distilled landing lines.
